name: Bugs On The Meadow
description:
You play a small bee on a small, flowered meadow. Just fly from flower to flower, collect pollen, seed new flowers - life could be just honey for you.

If only there wasn't this one bug who started eating your beloved flowers. And damn, it even gets children...

To collect pollen, fly to a flower and hit and hold space (it gets stucked sometimes, just try again or try another flower). Planting a seed with right click costs 30 pollen. Gameover when there are no flowers left on the little meadow.
